amendment.description: An amendment numbered 228 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to amend section 1725 to bolster the current report language on South Africa and to incorporate a full review of the bilateral relationship between the United States and South Africa.
amendment.purpose: Amendment expands the current report language on South Africa and to incorporate a full review of the bilateral relationship between the United States and South Africa.

vote.text: On agreeing to the James amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 272 - 144 (Roll no. 277).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the James amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 272 - 144 (Roll no. 277).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
